name: wamr
install-command: git clone https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-micro-runtime.git --depth 1 wamr && cd wamr/product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm
desc: WebAssembly Micro Runtime (WAMR) is a lightweight standalone WebAssembly runtime
update-command: cd wamr && git pull && rm -rf bin && cd product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm
